reviewText: This movie is terrible. The plot builds up to nothing in the end, what a waste of time. The beginning half the movie follows a group of soldiers fighting which then promptly just disregards and forgets about.wheres the continuity? Then even worse the movie just ends, as if they ran outta movie or film and thats it. Don't waste your money. A michael bay movie has more of a plotline then this does.

I saw this movie first run when I was living in Stockholm in 1968. It was amazing then, and just as good when rewatched recently. All Peter Watkins' movies are worth watching; this one is worth owning.
